The Benefits Of HIIT Training

August 16, 2025 ‚Ä¢ by Mohammad Sami Chowdhury ‚Ä¢ Program:

What is HIIT?

HIIT stands for High-Intensity Interval Training. It involves short bursts of all-out, intense exercise followed by brief recovery periods.

Top Benefits

  • Time-Efficient: Get a full workout in just 20-30 minutes.
  • Burns More Calories: HIIT burns a high number of calories in a short time and boosts your metabolism for hours after (the ‚Äúafterburn‚Äù effect).
  • Improves Cardiovascular Health: It‚Äôs incredibly effective at improving your VO2 max.
  • No Equipment Needed: Many HIIT workouts can be done using just your body weight.
